# Calculate Moran's I



```{python}
# read data
df_waste_5 = read_data(grid_size=5)
# Create spatial weights matrix
w_5 = calculate_weights(df_waste_5)
# Calculate global Moran's I

summary_moran(mi_5, label="5m")

# Calculate Local Moran's I

# Save results
```
